role.argrole: entity which comes to mind of arg0

example.parse: (IP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 说起) (NP-OBJ (NN 外企)))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (QP (CD 不少)) (NP (NN 人))) (VP (VV 想起) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-TPC (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-SBJ (NN 西服)) (VP (VA 笔挺))) (DEC 的))) (NP (PU “) (NN 白领) (PU ”)))))
example.arg: *OP* *T*-1 西服 笔挺 的 “ 白领 ”
